::JetV::
JetV sees Artemis come out.
"You can handle all that?" he quesioned...
"We should get going...."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Artemis:
>
> Artemis ended to picked up her things that she would need: her
> History tapes, her scouting tapes, her diary and seceral things
> more... also he took a small thing that showed a hologram, she turned
> off the Hologram and took it;  Now with her past behind and her
> future in front,  she was ready to left the place where she had lived
> since her spark turn on. She took all things that she needed and
> close the door.
>
> She walked towards the exit.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::JetV::
> > As she went in JetV smiled at himself.  He liked her. And it owuld
> be
> > nice to have another scout with them.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Artemis:
> > >
> > > "You can bet it" said the femme an she came in the built.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > ::JetV::
> > > > "All right...Ill jsut stay out here. he siad.  "Call if you need
> > > help"
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > > Artemis:
> > > > >
> > > > > "I really almost ready to leave the planet..."said kindly
> Artemis
> > > to
> > > > > JetV"In a nano I'll be here"
> > > > >
> > > > > She walked some steps towards the door.
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > > > ::JetV::
> > > > > > He answered the comm.
> > > > > > 'Crossroads...come on...wh are you talking to...this is
> JetV the
> > > > > mast
> > > > > > of stealth scouting. I'ts my job not to be noticed..'
> > > > > >
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > > > --- Pacifix / Swoop / Crossroads ---
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Pacifix's mask stretches downward in surprise, "I, I
> would ve
> > > > > > > honoured if you came Grimlock," said Pacifix, not wanting
> to
> > > upset
> > > > > > > him anymore, "Your battle skills and expertise would be
> > > extremely
> > > > > > > profitable to have along." He pauses, his facial
> expression
> > > > > changes
> > > > > > > to one of defense, "Grimlock, there are more ways that
> > > outright
> > > > > > > violence to solve problems that could be solved with wor--
> -"
> > > > > Pacifix
> > > > > > > is interupted, as another Dinobot who had arrived late as
> a
> > > > > > > spectator, but early enough to hear Grimlock, speaks up.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Swoop enters the Council chamber, and listens to
> Grimlock's
> > > > > > > inspiring speach. "If Grimlock go then Swoop go too.
> Dinobots
> > > deal
> > > > > > > with all kinds of stuff. Grimlock Dinobot leader, if
> Grimlock
> > > go,
> > > > > then
> > > > > > > Dinobots go as well." Swoop joins Grimlock, "Grimlock, put
> > > sword
> > > > > > > away you make other's nervous."
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Pacifix looks at the two Dinobots, and nods. He returns
> his
> > > > > > > attention to the Council, "I do not mind if the Dinobots
> come
> > > > > along,
> > > > > > > yet I leave the decision up to the Council." Pacifix
> frowns
> > > at the
> > > > > > > gutted podium.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > ----------------------------------------------------------
> ----
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Crossroads stops by his quarters, and picks up all that he
> > > will
> > > > > > > bring along. He looks about his room for the last
> > > > > time, "Farewell,"
> > > > > > > He grabs his strategy papers and journals, puts them into
> a
> > > > > > > compartment, and exits the building. He transforms
> into 'cycle
> > > > > > > mode and heads toward the secret ship. He opens a
> commlink to
> > > > > > > JetV, "JetV, this is Crossroads, what's up? I'm heading
> to the
> > > > > ship.
> > > > > > > Make sure that you're not seen by any Preds or 'Cons when
> you
> > > > > > > travel there... all would be lost if that were to happen.
> > > > > Crossroads
> > > > > > > out." He screams along the freeway, and cuts off a cuts
> off a
> > > Pred
> > > > > > > freighter, showing them his feelings. The unkind words
> coming
> > > from
> > > > > > > the freighter proved that the feelings were mutual.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > On 16 May 2001, at 22:02, robertdahl wrote:
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > Ironhide nods, as do many Autobots in aproval, but one
> can
> > > be
> > > > > heard in
> > > > > > > > an uproar. Ironhide turns his head to his side, and
> looks
> > > down,
> > > > > to see
> > > > > > > > the centre of the disturbance. One very large Autobot
> had
> > > > > already
> > > > > > > > smashed his desk, and was standing at his full height,
> very
> > > > > upset.
> > > > > > > > Ironhide knew he was in for trouble, "Is there a problem
> > > > > Grimlock?" He
> > > > > > > > asked, knowing there is. "YES THERE PROBLEM" Grimlock
> > > yelled,
> > > > > his
> > > > > > > > voice echoing very clearly throughout all of
> Iocon. "THIS
> > > > > BULLSHIT.
> > > > > > > > YOU SEND ROOKIES TO FIGHT IN WAR THAT AFFECT WHOLE
> GALAXY,
> > > EVEN
> > > > > WHOLE
> > > > > > > > TIME. YOU SEND A PACIFIST!!" he declared in rage, as he
> > > pointed
> > > > > a
> > > > > > > > finger at Pacifix. He pulled out his energon sword, and
> in
> > > one
> > > > > swipe,
> > > > > > > > cleaved his whole rows podium straight in half. Grimlock
> > > > > stopped and
> > > > > > > > looked up at the main council, his sword at his side,
> energy
> > > > > > > > shimmering off it.
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > Ironhide sighed, how did he get a weapon in this room.
> This
> > > > > wasnt the
> > > > > > > > first time this happened. "Grimlock, you know that if
> one
> > > of us
> > > > > goes
> > > > > > > > the Predacons will be on to us," He said calmly. "None
> of us
> > > > > can go".
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > Grimlock looked back up, then crossed his arms, his
> sword
> > > just
> > > > > above
> > > > > > > > his head, still shimmering, the energy intesifing the
> look
> > > of
> > > > > rage in
> > > > > > > > his crimson eyes. "Then I go to earth to" he said
> quietly,
> > > and
> > > > > he was
> > > > > > > > almost not heard with the large amount of gasps that
> escaped
> > > > > around
> > > > > > > > the room.
